import "./postDetail.css" import { ChatBubbleOutline, FavoriteBorder, Share, BookmarkBorder, MoreHoriz, SentimentSatisfiedAlt, Favorite } from "@mui/icons-material"; import {Link, useParams} from "react-router-dom"; import {useDispatch, useSelector} from "react-redux"; import {fetchPostDetail, getPost, getPostsbyID, getPostsStatus, likePost, reset} from "../../redux/postsSlice"; import PostAuthor from "./postAuthor"; import PostAvatar from "./postAvatar"; import {useEffect, useState} from "react"; import {useAuth} from "../../hooks"; import TimeAgo from "./TimeAgo"; import {axiosPrivate} from "../../axios/axios"; import Loading from "../../components/Loading/Loading"; const PostDetail = () => { const auth = useAuth() const dispatch = useDispatch() const { postId } = useParams() const post = useSelector(getPost) const status = useSelector(getPostsStatus) const [likes, setLikes] = useState(post?.likes) const hasLikedPost = post?.likes?.find((like) => like === auth._id) useEffect(() => { dispatch(fetchPostDetail({id: postId})) return () => { dispatch(reset()) } }, [postId]); if (!post) { return (

Post not found!
